name: @servicestack/ui
description: TypeScript Definitions for ServiceStack built-in UI's

scripts.build: npm run typedoc:build && npm run docs:build
scripts.docs:build: api-extractor run --local --verbose && api-documenter markdown -i temp -o docs && node -e "require('child_process').execSync(('cp '+path.join('config','custom','*')+' docs').replace(/^cp/,path.sep!='/'?'copy':'cp'))"

author: ServiceStack, Inc. (https://servicestack.net)
